verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There is power, power
Here in this hour, this hour
We're all together, together
Waiting here as one

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Whoa, hear the sound from Heaven
Whoa, a mighty rushing wind
Whoa, we're calling for revival
God let Your fire fall again

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
All Your sons and Your daughters
Dreaming the dreams of the Father
Seeing the signs and the wonders
The Kingdom of God

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
I cannot contain it
This fire inside
I cannot contain it
So let it shine
I cannot contain it
This light of mine
